name: Michele Romano
occupation: I am an engineer, into building constructions,ect
description: Am an ambitious man who loves to laugh and have fun, live life to the fullest and a serious business oriented man. I’m at a level in my life where I want to build something with a woman and I have a lot to offer all that is needed for love, the sacrifice and the devotion. I’m looking for a friend forever or a serious relationship, I am not a player… My Match would be a sensitive and affectionate woman. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. I love and admire a woman with something going on and possesses many skills. Insight: Cooking is definitely the way to my heart and soul, lol! I’m looking for someone with a sense of humor and knows how to laugh and merry but i also understand that life is not about to be joked about, you need to be serious when you need to and have fun when you need too…. if you think you can make me laugh, try me on a date…
